mapper.insert: insert into tp_video_record(video_id, user_id, batch_num, duration, completed_duration, is_completed, create_time, update_time) values(#{videoId}, #{userId}, #{batchNum}, #{duration}, #{completedDuration}, #{isCompleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

is_completed = #{isCompleted},
